page.title: 11 KINSON SCHOOL
page.content: The present Kinson School was built in 1936 and celebrates its fiftieth anniversary next year.The first Kinson School was built in 1820 and later was pulled down.Pictures of it can be found in books on Old Kinson.There have been three previous schools in Kinson. Kinson School is situated between School Lane and Kinson Road.There are about 200 pupila aged between 5 years and 11 years.There are 9 teachers.The caretaker is Mr.W.Crane. There is a school field which has two football pitches in the winter and a 100 metre and 300 metre track in the summer.There is an infant playground and two junior playgrounds_one for the girls and the other for the boys.
